short_summary: Bid for electrical work at DND 17 Wing Detachment, Dundurn, Saskatchewan.
description: Upgrades to general electrical system, high voltage overhead work, underground work, and alarm panel jobs.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Project Details**

* **Reference:** WS4434121604-Doc4434171716
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4434121604
* **Publication Date:** April 4, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date:** April 11, 2024

**Project Description**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a service provider to undertake electrical services at 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn in Dundurn, Saskatchewan. The successful bidder will be awarded a standing offer for general electrical work, high voltage/overhead work, underground work, and alarm panel work as required.

**Key Requirements**

* The successful bidder must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by May 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.
* Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
* The project will be undertaken within the province of Saskatchewan.

**Contracting Entity**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity**

* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Person:** Eric Kwan
* **Contact Email:** [eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** N/A
* **Contact Fax:** N/A

**Access to Tender Documents**

The tender documents are available on Ariba Discovery at the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19309298?extsite=MTkzMDkyOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

We look forward to receiving your bid. Please note that only bids submitted according to the specified timeframe and requirements will be considered.  Thank you. ···
